ARABIC: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ فَلَنْ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرًا لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, because of Your blessing to me, I will never be a supporter of evildoers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Moses) said: "O Lord, as You have been gracious to me I will never aid the guilty."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon Moses vowed: "My Lord, because of the favour that You have done me I shall never support the guilty."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "Lord, in appreciation for Your favor to me I shall never support the criminals".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “My Lord! The way You have bestowed favour upon me, so never will I be a supporter of the guilty.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "My Lord! For that with which You have favored me, I will nevermore be a helper of the criminals!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: My Lord! because Thou hast bestowed a favor on me, I shall never be a backer of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'My Lord, forasmuch as Thou hast blessed me, I will never be a partisan of the sinners.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Forasmuch as Thou hast favoured me, I will nevermore be a supporter of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "My Lord, because of the favour that You have shown me, I vow that I will never be a helper of the guilty."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: my Lord! whereas Thou hast favoured me, I shall nevermore be a supporter of the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! As You have blessed me, I will never be a supporter of the guilty.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my Lord! For that Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace on me, never shall I be a help to those who sin!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "My Lord! For that with which You have favoured me, I will never more be a helper for the Mujrimun (criminals, disobedient to Allah, polytheists, sinners, etc.)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'My Lord as You have favored me, I will never be a helper to the wrongdoer'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, in as much as you have favored me, I will never be a supporter of the criminals.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:17]   He said, ‘My Lord, forasmuch as You have been gracious to me, with forgiveness, protect me [so], I will never be a partisan, a supporter, of the criminals’, the disbelievers henceforth, if you were to protect me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: My Lord! Forasmuch as Thou hast favoured me) with knowledge and the profession of Your divine Oneness and forgiveness, (I will nevermore be a supporter of the guilty) do not make me a helper to the idolaters: Pharaoh and his host.
